name: Sort columns for WFH Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Sort columns for WFH Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=View Request Status, tab=Work From Home})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Request Status" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
When Click on "Work From Home" tab
Then Sort "Duty Type" columns and verify sorting
Then Sort "Reason,Remarks" Columns and verify Sort
